OpenSim::AbstractConstraint

AbstractConstraint Class Reference

#include <AbstractConstraint.h>

Inheritance diagram for AbstractConstraint:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A base class that specifies the interface for a Constraint.

Author:
Ajay Seth
Version:
1.0
